StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateSelec.onBoardOSOWorksheet]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @NWAID int, @BoardID int, @OSOAcademicNotes varchar(500), @OSOPhysicalNotes varchar(500), @OSOLeadershipNotes varchar(500) )
AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[SELECTION_BOARD_OSO_WORKSHEET] WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID AND BOARD_ID = @BoardID) BEGIN UPDATE [mcriss].[dbo].[SELECTION_BOARD_OSO_WORKSHEET] SET [OSO_ACADEMIC_NOTES] = @OSOAcademicNotes ,[OSO_PHYSICAL_NOTES] = @OSOPhysicalNotes ,[OSO_LEADERSHIP_NOTES] = @OSOLeadershipNotes WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID AND BOARD_ID = @BoardID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [mcriss].[dbo].[SELECTION_BOARD_OSO_WORKSHEET] ([WORKSHEET_ID] ,[NWA_ID] ,[BOARD_ID] ,[OSO_ACADEMIC_NOTES] ,[OSO_PHYSICAL_NOTES] ,[OSO_LEADERSHIP_NOTES]) VALUES (NEWID() ,@NWAID ,@BoardID ,@OSOAcademicNotes ,@OSOPhysicalNotes ,@OSOLeadershipNotes) END
